attributes.action: Get Chris Dickinson the cancer treatment he needs and others who are getting half a service and drugs
attributes.additional_details: Chris is among lots of others that are being told that there isn't enough of the cancer drug to be treated this is a recent status https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=611219462337445&id=100003481895133 disgusting that people whom could have a fighting chance are not getting or getting half a treatment !!! This needs to change how date they play god with people's lives
